page.title: 08WHITTONSTALL VILLAGE FETE
page.content: {JOANNE FOSTER AGED 9 YEARS ON SATURDAY AT 2.00 PM I CAME TO SCHOOL BECAUSE IT WAS THE GRAND FETE. WHEN I GOT THERE FIRST I WENT ON THE TOMBOLA AND A HAD A GO NAMING THE DOG; I NAMED THE DOG SOOTY. THEN I WENT ON KONKORD KASTLE, THEN ON THE TOMBOLA AGAIN I WON AN ELEPHANT BOOK. MAM AND ASHLEY WENT TO HAVE TEA AND I WENT TO GET SOME SWEETS AND THEN I WENT ON THE KONKORD KASTLE AND MAM AND ASHLEY AND I BOUGHT SOME THINGS FROM ELLIOT'S STALL. I BOUGHT A BOOK AND A BOX OF THINGS. I WENT ON KONKORD KASTLE AGAIN AND ON THE KONKORD KASTLEI PLAYED WITH JAMES WHEN I FELL OVER JAMES GOT ME AND HIM THEN I WENT TO GET A COCONUT, THEY WERE 30P AND I WENT AND SAT DOWN WITH ASHLEY AND MAM, THEN I GAVE 12P TO TINA'S MAM FOR A RIDE ON THE PONY AND TRAP, FINALLY WE WENT HOME.
